projects.title: Do AI and Human Experts See Pneumonia the Same Way?
projects.tags: Computer Vision, Explainable AI, Medical Imaging
projects.description: Compared CNN saliency maps with expert annotations on pediatric chest X-rays to understand if AI models identify pneumonia using the same visual cues as doctors. Found that high accuracy doesn't guarantee human-interpretable reasoning.

projects.title: More Efficient Text Diffusion via Length Prediction
projects.tags: Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Optimization
projects.description: Improved computational efficiency of Diffusion Language Models by predicting output sequence length before generation. Achieved 80% accuracy in length prediction, reducing computation by up to 800 tokens per generation.

projects.title: Gooper
projects.description: A search engine for influencers.

projects.title: Fundamental Matrix Estimation
projects.description: Python implementation of the eight-point algorithm for estimating the fundamental matrix between two camera views of the same scene.

projects.title: Single View Metrology
projects.description: Computer vision algorithm that estimates a person's height from a single image using a reference object in the scene.

projects.title: Information Retrieval
projects.description: Algorithm that retrieves the most relevant answer from a corpus given a user query.

projects.title: Wordle Solver
projects.description: Optimal strategy solver for Wordle that achieves 100% success rate with an average of 2.91 guesses in 0.5 seconds.

projects.title: Image Compression via IP
projects.description: Image compression pipeline using K-means clustering optimized through Integer Programming techniques.

projects.title: Resilient Companies
projects.description: Analysis of 31,710 Indian companies to identify those with consistent strong performance before and after 2020, exploring the role of information systems in business resilience.

projects.title: SCIP Debugging
projects.description: Used debugging tools (gdb and AFL++) to identify and fix two bugs in SCIP, an open-source linear programming solver.

projects.title: Boolean Compiler
projects.description: A compiler implementation for a custom boolean programming language.

projects.title: Bachelor of Science Thesis
projects.description: Enhanced scGPT transformer model for gene expression prediction by incorporating biological knowledge of transcriptional regulation, achieving significant accuracy improvements.

projects.title: Evolving Tinder
projects.description: Applied evolutionary algorithms to improve matching stability beyond the traditional Deferred Acceptance Algorithm for two-sided matching problems.

projects.title: Q-Learning Playground
projects.description: Interactive web application demonstrating Q-learning algorithm and the Bellman Equation through visual examples.

projects.title: Daily Spin Bot
projects.description: Automated browser bot for maximizing rewards in SNAI Daily Spin game, available as executable.

projects.title: Standardization
projects.description: Statistical analysis of how standardization in customer support affects satisfaction using OLS regression with controls for confounding variables and industry effects.

projects.title: F1 Race Analysis
projects.tags: Python, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Mining
projects.description: Interactive dashboard displaying Formula 1 statistics and insights from historical data through current races, with automatic updates after each Grand Prix.

projects.title: Production Function Estimation
projects.tags: R, Panel Data Analysis, FE/RE Model
projects.description: Applied Fixed Effect and Random Effect models to estimate firm production functions while controlling for individual and time-specific heterogeneity.

projects.title: Words Generator
projects.description: Neural networks trained on word corpora to generate novel, realistic-sounding words that don't exist in any language.

projects.title: House Price Predictor
projects.tags: Python, Random Forest Regressor, Neural Network, Linear Regression
projects.description: Machine learning models for predicting house prices in Milan, Rome, and Venice using a dataset of over 45,000 properties.

projects.title: Taylor Rule Estimation by OLS
projects.description: Estimated Austria's interest rate policy using OLS regression and Taylor's rule framework, with comprehensive diagnostic testing for model robustness.
